main event: Eleven round, white objects, the size of baseballs, were observed traveling in a single file formation over Oakhurst, N.J.
interesting points: The objects were seen approximately seven minutes apart., The objects looked like planes without wings as they moved., The trajectory of the objects was from southwest to northeast., One observer noted a shadowy object near the first light., Preliminary analysis suggested that the objects could possibly have been B-47 aircraft in the area.
